author: alyeska_97
content: What is the difference between the priorityFee and the regular Fee? I thought everything but the baseFee was sprinkles on top of the cupcake for the miner to eat?

author: timbeiko
content: <@!606706391809392650> the priority fee is the part of the transaction fee that goes to miners, whereas the base fee is what gets burnt. Because the base fee can vary from block to block, transactions set a "max fee" (the max total they want to pay) and if the base fee ends up being lower than that, they get a refund for the difference.

author: timbeiko
content: For example, if the base fee is 10, I set a max fee of 20 and priority fee of 2, then I'll pay 10 + 2, and get a "refund" of 8 gwei
